info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 2:39PM CDT until August 31 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Harris, Liberty and Montgomery.
* WHEN...Until 500 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 239 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Humble, Kingwood, Barrett, Channelview, Highlands, Crosby, Atascocita, Lake Houston, Lake Houston Dam, Sheldon, East Houston, eastern Bush Intercontinental Airport, East Little York / Homestead, Eastex / Jensen Area and Porter. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Harris, TX; Liberty, TX; Montgomery, TX
